title: js-notes

desc: JavaScript front app, mvc pattern, html generation, json data, minimalistic styles.

format: First was HTML tutorial.
Then c# cli app generating html notes from json data.
It had 2 templates.
Page was made from it.
Then Javascript course.
After that javasctipt front app.
Story {0}
1. User can switch beetween styles (none, desktop, mobile). 5
2. User has styles to chose from (none, desktop, mobile). 5
3. User has color markers cycling from 1-7 in a loop, used on params in notes. 5
4. User can use json data from another repo and page. 5
5. User can input data to form, to generate note json file. 4
Feature {0}
1. Switch beetween styles (none, desktop, mobile). 5
2. Usefull Styles, none, desktop, mobile. 5
3. Color markers, from 1-7, looping on params in notes. 5
4. Json data in separete repo and page (test if this will work). 5
1. 3 css files added to html's. (none, desktop, mobile)
Simple links based control is added to html's.
On load, desktop style is enabled, others disabled.
On link click, coresponding style is enabled.
Very simple and works, that was the point.
2. Very Minimalistic Desktop style added.
3. There can be n params with name and description, used in code section.
Each param name is marked by color form 1 to 7, after that from 1 again in loop.
Each param description in detail aside have matching color marker.

summary: App in use for making notes.
